org.deeplearning4j.earlystopping.trainer

Class EarlyStoppingTrainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.earlystopping.trainer.BaseEarlyStoppingTrainer<MultiLayerNetwork>
      • org.deeplearning4j.earlystopping.trainer.EarlyStoppingTrainer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEarlyStoppingTrainer<MultiLayerNetwork>

    public class EarlyStoppingTrainer
extends BaseEarlyStoppingTrainer<MultiLayerNetwork>
    Class for conducting early stopping training locally (single machine), for training a MultiLayerNetwork. To train a ComputationGraph, use EarlyStoppingGraphTrainer
